languages.text: {n}Как только связь с Главным кормчим обрывается, в воксе раздается голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, я буду рад сопроводить вас во время высадки на Даргонус, чтобы лично представить Ахиллеаса Скаландра — слугу Золотого Трона, служившего Леди Теодоре на Даргонусе. Рассчитываю на вашу благосклонность".

traits.locale_text: Как только связь с Мастером Вокса обрывается, в воксе раздается голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, я буду рад сопроводить вас во время высадки на Даргонус, чтобы лично представить Ахиллеаса Скаландра — слугу Золотого Трона, служившего леди Теодоре на Даргонусе. Рассчитываю на вашу благосклонность".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."
languages.original_text: {n}Как только связь с Главным кормчим обрывается, в воксе раздается голос Хейнрикса.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, я буду рад сопроводить вас во время высадки на Даргонус, чтобы лично представить Ахиллеаса Скаландра — слугу Золотого Трона, служившего Леди Теодоре на Даргонусе. Рассчитываю на вашу благосклонность".

I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}与舵手长的通话结束之后，海因里希的声音从音阵设备中响了起来。{/n}“舰长大人，我很愿意在你造访达戈努斯期间陪同，这样我便可以亲自向你介绍阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德。他是黄金王座的仆人，之前曾在达戈努斯陪伴过西奥多拉夫人。我等待着你的仁慈。”
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.locale_text: {n}与舵手长的通话结束之后，海因里希的声音从音阵设备中响了起来。{/n}“舰长大人，我很愿意在你造访达戈努斯期间陪同，这样我便可以亲自向你介绍阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德。他是黄金王座的仆人，之前曾在达戈努斯陪伴过西奥多拉夫人。我等待着你的仁慈。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras la conexión con el maestro timonel, del dispositivo brota la voz de Heinrix.{/n} «Lord Capitán, será un placer acompañarle en su visita a Dargonus. Quiero presentarle a Achilleas Scalander, un sirviente del Trono Dorado que anteriormente ayudó a lady Theodora en Dargonus. Cuento con su benevolencia».
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras la conexión con el maestro timonel, del dispositivo brota la voz de Heinrix.{/n} «Lord Capitán, será un placer acompañarle en su visita a Dargonus. Quiero presentarle a Achilleas Scalander, un sirviente del Trono Dorado que anteriormente ayudó a lady Theodora en Dargonus. Cuento con su benevolencia».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nachdem die Verbindung mit dem Steuermann beendet wurde, ertönt Heinrix' Stimme aus dem Gerät.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich freue mich, Euch bei Eurem Besuch auf Dargonus zu begleiten, damit ich Euch Achilleas Scalander persönlich vorstellen kann ... einen Diener des Goldenen Throns, der einst Lady Theodora auf Dargonus begleitet hat. Ich baue auf Euer Wohlwollen."
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.locale_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une fois la connexion avec le maître timonier coupée, l'appareil se met à cracher la voix d'Heinrix en crépitant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je me ferai une joie de vous accompagner lors de votre visite de Dargonus afin de vous présenter personnellement Achilleas Scalander, loyal sujet du Trône d'Or et anciennement au service de dame Théodora. Je compte sur votre bienveillance. »
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fois la connexion avec le maître timonier coupée, l'appareil se met à cracher la voix d'Heinrix en crépitant.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je me ferai une joie de vous accompagner lors de votre visite de Dargonus afin de vous présenter personnellement Achilleas Scalander, loyal sujet du Trône d'Or et anciennement au service de dame Théodora. Je compte sur votre bienveillance. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}マスター・ヘルムスマンとの接続が切断され、ハインリックスの声で装置はパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、俺が喜んでダルゴナスに同行するし、アキレアス・スカランダーを直々に紹介もしよう。アキレアス・スカランダーは、以前ダルゴナスでシオドーラ殿に付き従った黄金の玉座の従者だ。慈善活動だと思って頼むよ」
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・ヘルムスマンとの接続が切断され、ハインリックスの声で装置はパチパチと音を立てる。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、俺が喜んでダルゴナスに同行するし、アキレアス・スカランダーを直々に紹介もしよう。アキレアス・スカランダーは、以前ダルゴナスでシオドーラ殿に付き従った黄金の玉座の従者だ。慈善活動だと思って頼むよ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Başserdümen ile iletişim kesildikten sonra cihazdan Heinrix'in sesi yükseliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Dargonus ziyaretin sırasında sana eşlik etmekten mutluluk duyarım, böylece Achilleas Scalander ile seni bizzat tanıştırabilirim. Kendisi Altın Taht'ın bir hizmetkârıdır. Daha öncesinde Dargonus'ta Leydi Theodora ile çalışmaktaydı. Yardımseverliğini konuşturacağın konusunda sana güveniyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}After the connection to the Master Helmsman is cut, the device crackles with Heinrix's voice.{/n} "Lord Captain, I will be pleased to accompany you during your visit to Dargonus so I can personally introduce Achilleas Scalander — a servant of the Golden Throne who previously attended Lady Theodora on Dargonus. I am counting on your benevolence."
